br.div:
This meeting will be conducted in accordance with Minnesota Statute 13D.021. One or more board members will be participating by telephone or other electronic means.
In accordance with Minnesota Statute 13D.021, members of the public are not permitted to attend this meeting due to the current health pandemic. Persons may monitor this meeting from a remote location by visiting this website where they will find the live-stream video.
Comments for public forum may be submitted by email to schoolboard@isd761.org by 3:00 pm on Monday, April 27.
